In order to help an individual advance their [[Orochimaru's Juinjutsu|cursed seal]] to its second level, the [[Sound Four]] use the [[Four Black Fogs Formation]].<ref>''[[Tō no Sho]]'', page 229</ref> After the individual and the Black Fogs have been placed within a confined space, such as a coffin, [[Sakon]] uses the Dark Sealing Method: he places five talismans, each inscribed with [[seal]]ing formulas written in his blood, around the coffin's rim. This creates a [[barrier]] around the coffin, keeping the Black Fogs contained until the cursed seal's advancement has completed. So long as the barrier is in place, even the [[Byakugan]] is unable to see within it.<ref name="d2"/>
